title: Nature Domain
content: WIS SaveConcentration STONESKIN Lv 4 Abjuration Action Turn a creature's flesh hard as stone. It takes only half the damage of all non-magical Bludgeoning, Piercing. and Slashing damage. Until Long Rest Melee Concentration WALL OF FIRE Lv 4 Evocation Action 5-40 Damage 5d8 Fire Create a blazing wall of fire, burning anyone who dares stand too close.18m DEX SaveConcentration CONTAGION Lv 5 Necromancy Action Poison a target and possibly afflict them with a disease of your choice.
